column1: Senago (Lombard: Senagh [seˈnɑːk]) is a comune (municipality) in the Metropolitan City of Milan in the Italian region Lombardy
column2: located about 13 kilometres (8 mi) north of Milan. As of 30 November 2017
column3: it had a population of 21.519 and an area of 8.6 square kilometres (3.3 sq mi).Senago borders the following municipalities: Limbiate

column1: The Villa San Carlo Borromeo is located in Senago.
